name: DeleteMultipleDatadogApps
description:
Delete multiple apps in Datadog using app IDs.

This tool deletes multiple applications from Datadog in a single request using a list of app IDs. It requires a registered application key or configured UI permissions.

parameters.name: app_ids_to_delete
parameters.description: An array of objects with each object containing the 'id' (string) of the app to delete and 'type' set as 'appDefinitions'.

id.description: The ID of the app to delete.

data.description: An array of objects containing the IDs of the apps to delete.
